Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the duration of ATM closures in September by stating that they will remain closed for 6 days, while the Ministry of Finance clarifies that only some banks might remain closed on certain days.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in the provided claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by not providing enough accurate information about the specific days and banks that will be closed in September.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a viral message on WhatsApp and Facebook, without providing any official sources or credible evidence.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that all ATMs may remain cashless during the supposed closure period, which is not supported by any reliable information.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide any alternative explanations for the closure of ATMs or contradicting information.
